description: There is a sickening stench here.  It smells of blood and death.  To the
north, you catch glimpses of daylight.  To the east, you simply cannot see.
The trees are close and stifling.  Before you to the west, lies a humongous
tower that ascends upward and lost in the thick underbrush of the dark
forest.  Strange noises can be heard and "felt" within the tower.  You gaze
at this sightly spectacle and wonder if you should enter there.
3522.name: A Curve in the Path

description: You see daylight and a trail to follow.
The stench seems to becoming from this direction.
The sign reads:
The Woodsman
| This zone originally written for Copper II DIKU |
|   by ?                                          |
| Modification and alterations for MERCmud DIKU   |
|   by VampLestat                        1 JAN 93 |
You are standing on a well-worn path which opens into a clearing.
An old, wooden building is here with smoke billowing from its
chimney. A painted sign is visible on the porch to the west. You
could go north or south around the building or leave this place and
return to the forest.
3570.name: The Front of the Inn

description: You can go north around the inn.
The front door of the inn beckons.
The eastern road is losing ground to the creeping desert here.  You
stagger in the growing heat, and wonder if you have enough water.  The
endless waste of the Sands of Sorrows is south, and the road continues
east and west.  The sun paints illusions at the edge of your vision,
one of them looks like a far off city...
3530.name: Near the Sands of Sorrow

description: You are in a darker corner in the Inn.  A large round table with a few
wooden chairs sits here.  There is a large stain on the table, the remnants
of a spilled drink.
3577.name: The Bard's Table

description: You see the main floor of the Inn to the east.
You are in the common room of the Woodsman Inn. A thin haze of smoke sits
in the air here. The Inn is often empty, as the forest has become overrun by
goblins as of late, and it is no longer safe in these parts. The bar is just
north of here. If you'd rather have your own table, one is empty to the
south.
3574.name: The Woodsman Inn

description: The bar is here, manned by the innkeeper.
You can leave now and return to fresher air.
An empty table is a rare commodity.
You are travelling down the eastern road between Westbridge and the
eastern lands.  The road back to Westbridge is west of you, and a
heavily guarded checkpoint is east.  A beautiful grove of trees is to
north.
3539.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: The branches above you block out all direct sunlight, making the forest
in this area rather dark.  The forest continues east, where it meets the
mountains. The air is still and stuffy - a stench comes from the west and an
ugly feeling causes the hair to rise on the back of your neck!
3523.name: The Dark Forest

description: It appears to get much darker that direction.
The sky becomes lighter in this direction.
South of the road, is filled with sand dunes and the desert.  The
heat is sucking the life from your body, you wonder if it will ever
end.  To your south, the Sands of Sorrow stretch on for miles, and to
the east you think you see the towers of a magnificent city...  Or is
it just a mirage.  To the north, a thick forest stands, a large,
cobble stone road goes north towards the mountains.
3547.name: Near the Sands of Sorrow

description: This is a overgrown foot-trail south of the inn. It leads west, but you
would be hard pressed to follow it far. A number of bushes are trampled on
and some medium sized branches have been knocked down.  Obviously there has
been a battle here rather recently.
3575.name: The Ambush Point

description: The inn lies to the north.
You are standing at the south corner of the inn.  You could easily
go north and enter through the front door, or south and to the rear of
the establishment.  You hear some of the loud carousing within the Inn
filtering out.
3533.name: South Corner of the Inn

description: You are standing on the plains.  This is a vast desolate place
where the wind can howl undisturbed since nothing but you bars its
way.  However you are not the first to wander here.  Before you
somebody has left a small path.  The path looks rather bewildered and
is not the kind of path to lead to anywhere significant or important
but it seems to have made up its mind to enter the hills far away
north.
3537.name: The Plains

description: The footpath wides into a full blown roadway that begins here and
leads south down the shallow drop of the valley.  The sounds of a
river can be heard nearby, and all around this road, the forest thins
into lush fields of wheat and barley.
3558.name: A Road

description: The path continues east and south.  You notice fresh tracks in
the soft ground that show the horsemen turned, and fled south.
3582.name: On the Trail of the Horsemen

description: Here footworn paths meet leading north, south and east. The trees seem to
be closing in on you at this point, and you can barely see the sky
through the thick branches above your head.
3510.name: A Crossroads

description: Trees as far as the eye can see.
There is an especially dark part of the forest this way.
There is an especially dark section of forest this way.
You are standing north of the inn. Things don't look much different
from this angle.  The air here is filled with smells of smoke and cooking.
South, the front porch is waiting for you... or you can see if there is
a back door.
3571.name: North of the Inn

description: You see the front of the Inn.
The temperatures are climbing as you near the Sands of Sorrow, a
barren wasteland blasted by arcane powers.  Ahead of you, the road is
partially buried by the creeping sands, and the air grows even hotter.
3542.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: There seems to be no one in this end of the Woodsman, probably a safe place
to rest and lick your wounds ...
3579.name: A Quieter Section of the Inn

description: You see the common room.
The forest is dark, and becomes even darker west.  You sense
that there is something evil hidden in these woods.  The forest gets
lighter to the north.  The wind kicks up as you ponder your options.
3513.name: The Miden'nir

description: There is a small clearing to the north.
It gets darker and thicker this way.
The path continues east and west of here.  You notice fresh tracks in
the soft ground that show the horsemen fled to the west.
3581.name: On the Trail of the Horsemen

description: You are standing south of the inn.  You could easily go north and enter
through the front door, or west and to the rear of the establishment.  You
here some muffled cries from a tiny trail leading south of here.
3572.name: South of the Inn

description: This way leads to the back of the inn.
The trail heads south.
The forest is light here and you can easily pick your way through the
trail.  To the east, the forest becomes thick and darker. South, the trail
continues.
3515.name: Light Forest

description: A trail leading north-south.
The trees get thicker as you go east.
More trees and some small hills.
The most prominent feature here is the mountains that lie to the east.
You can only go north and west from here as the rocks stop all other
movement.
3517.name: Near the Mountains

description: Many trees to the north.
There is a bit of a slope downward to the west.
The tunnel gets lighter to the north, presumably leading out, while to
the south the passage gets smaller and smaller.  A small alcove has been
carved into the east wall.
3553.name: A Tunnel in the Mountains

description: You see a small alcove.
The tunnel gets smaller in this direction.
You stomp your way through the underbrush.  The dark forest of Miden'nir
get pretty thick here, and the branches high above your head are so thick that
they block out all direct sunlight.  While it is much too thick to go
further east, you might be able to make your way though the forest to the
south and west.
3520.name: The Dark Forest

description: The thick forest continues.
The thick forest continues.
You are travelling down the eastern road between Westbridge and the
eastern lands.  The road back to Westbridge is west of you, and a
heavily guarded checkpoint is east.  A beautiful grove of trees is
north.
3540.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: You are strolling along a pleasant, shady lane.  The road is lined
on both sides by tall, stately trees which lend the scene with a sense
of quiet serenity.  You can follow the road north or south.  A large
Inn & Tavern stands to the west.
3501.name: The Lane

description: South of the road, is filled with sand dunes and the desert.  The
heat is sucking the life from your body, you wonder if it will ever
end.  To your south, the Sands of Sorrow stretch on for miles, and to
the east you think you see the towers of a magnificent city...  Or is
it just a mirage.  To the north, a thick forest stands, a large,
cobble stone road goes north towards the mountains.
3544.name: Near the Sands of Sorrow

description: You find yourself at the foot of the mountains, where it is much to steep
to continue north or east.  You see the lush, green forest of Miden'nir to the
south and west.
3550.name: At The Foot of The Mountains

description: The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.
The forest of Miden'nir spreads out before you.
You are walking along a well-travelled road between Westbridge and lands
east.  A northern road crosses this one to the west, towards Westbridge.
You hear faint, happy singing to the north.  You see a small shop to the
south.
3525.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: You see a faint trail, covered with tiny footprints. The singing grows louder.
You now stand behind the inn. The smell here is not so pleasant as
the keeper and his help throw a good deal of garbage here. A couple of
piles of rubbish are to the west, but you will smell the worse for
meddling there. As a clean alternative, you can go north or east around
the inn.
3573.name: Behind the Inn

description: You can go around the inn this way.
Only rats and fool adventurers play in garbage.
The road leads east into the peace and quiet - and dangers - of the
forest, and to the west a town can be seen.  A strange droning sound
seems to come from the north.  You see Westbridge's Graveyard to the
south.
3534.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that
lurks in these woods.  You can go north toward the mountains, or west
to the forest, and if you are feeling brave, east into a cavern at the
base of the mountain.
3512.name: The Miden'nir

description: The forest continues here.
A light section of forest.
The trail becomes nearly unpassable here. You can go north
as the forest is relatively light. To the south, you can see a path.
3518.name: The Fading Trail

description: You can see a trail this way.
Dark forests.
You are hemmed in by trees on either side of you.  The path
continues north and south, and while is much to thick to explore west,
you can head off into the woods to the east.
3519.name: The Dark Path

description: The forest gets lighter this way.
The forest continues.
There is a strong stench coming from this direction.
South of the road, is filled with sand dunes and the desert.  The heat is
sucking the life from your body, you wonder if it will ever end.  To your
south, the Sands of Sorrow stretch on for miles, and to the east you think
you see the towers of a magnificent city...  Or is it just a mirage.  To the
north, a thick forest stands, a large, cobble stone road goes north towards
the mountains.
3531.name: Near the Sands of Sorrow

description: You are met by a group of heavily armored knights.  They check you over
for contraband, and then allow you to pass on.  One of the knights cautions to
not stray into the desert, lest you lose your way. You see the temple of
Mystra inbeded to the north, surround by the forest.
3527.name: The Checkpoint

description: You are walking along a well-travelled road between Westbridge and
lands east.  A northern road crosses this one to the west, towards
Westbridge.  You hear faint, happy singing to the north.
3538.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: You are standing on the plains.  This is a vast desolate place
where the wind can howl undisturbed since nothing but you bars its
way.  However you are not the first to wander here.  Before you
somebody has left a small path.  The path looks rather bewildered and
is not the kind of path to lead to anywhere significant or important
but it seems to have made up its mind to enter the hills far away
north.
3500.name: The Plains

description: The road ends at the banks of the Cottonwood River, which stretches
east and west here.  Across it is a bridge south which leads into a
town.  The road is well-worn and grooved from traveling carts and
horses, suggesting this town is rather large.  The s
3559.name: A Road

description: The corpses looked as if they have been pierced by a large, jagged
spear. The damage these people sustained is simply amazing. Worse, the
lips on the bodies are a light shade of blue, hinting at poison in
their systems.
Here, you see a gruesome sight.  Blood is everywhere...  On the trees and
soaked into the ground.  Two carcasses lie in front of you, seeming to look
up at you.  The forest is impassible to the south, but the other directions
look ok.  Far into the west amongst the thick trees and bushes, you make out
a huge structure of some sort.  Blood is drenched everywhere about you.
Should you go check it out?
3521.name: Carnage

description: Darkness...
Your light does not extend that far.
More dark forest.
| This area originally written for Copper II DIKU |
|   by ?                                          |
| Modifications and alterations for MERCmud DIKU  |
|   by VampLestat                        1 JAN 93 |
You are in a light forest. A path leads south, but the passage to the
east is easy enough. To the west, smoke can be seen rising above the
treetops. The sprawl of Westbridge lies north of here.
3505.name: The Trail to Miden'nir

description: To the north, you see the southern gates of Westbridge.
More light forest.
This path cuts through the darkness of the Miden'nir.
The forest is deep here and the wind blows through the trees and
through your hair. To the north, the forest gets lighter. However, the
southern and western paths place you even deeper in the wood.
3507.name: The Miden'nir

description: The forest is lighter in this direction.
There is a small path leading west.
More and darker woods.
The trail of the horsemen continues east and north along this path through
the forest.  The tracks are still fresh, so they must be near.
3583.name: On the Trail of the Horsemen

description: The tracks lead east.
You are walking along a well-travelled road, just east of a heavily
guarded checkpoint.  You have covered about half the distance between
the city of Westbridge and New Thalos.  The air is getting drier and the heat
more oppressive as you near the the barren wastes of the Sands of Sorrow.
3528.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: The path continues east and west of here.  You notice fresh tracks in
the soft ground that show the horsemen fled to the west.
3504.name: On the Trail of the Horsemen

description: You are in a dark forest. To the east, mountains block passage. From
here, only the lighter forest to the west or south offer a way to travel.
3506.name: The Miden'nir

description: The forest gets lighter as you go west.
The forest is darker to the south.
As you explore further into the mountainside, the tunnel gets smaller and
smaller to the south.  You almost have to hunch over to make your way thru
this area.  A small archway to the south leads into a large chamber.
3555.name: A Tunnel in the Mountains

description: The tunnel continues north.
You see a small cavern.
The walls of this tunnel were carved out many years ago by the goblins of
this forest.  The floor is well worn, and continues south, into the
mountain, or back north out into the forest.
3552.name: A Tunnel in the Mountains

description: Outside, you see the forest of Miden'nir.
The branches above you block out all direct sunlight, making the forest
in this area very dark.  The forest continues west, but mountains block
further exploration in all other directions, except south, where you notice a
small tunnel dug into the mountainside.
3551.name: Deep in the Forest of Miden'nir

description: The path continues east and west of here.  You notice fresh tracks in
the soft ground that show the horsemen fled to the west.
3524.name: On the Trail of the Horsemen

description: The ground is quite muddy here and puddles are all around. Your boots
make a disgusting SQUISH as you walk here. You can go in any of the
four cardinal directions from here. Hopefully, it will be dryer.
3516.name: Muddy Ground

description: The Miden'nir continues.
More trees.
Some light trees and daylight.
The trees get VERY thick to the south. You can barely see...
The sun is hot enough to melt your armor, but salvation is at hand.  To the
east, you see the mighty gates of New Thalos, one of the most prosperous cities
of all of Thera.  To the south, you see the endless wasteland of the Sands
of Sorrows, and to the west you can barely make out a faint, but well-used,
road leading to the City of Westbridge.
3532.name: On the Outskirts of New Thalos

description: You are on a north-south trail through the woods. To the west, impassable
mountains glare at you, and the thick woods and undergrowth prevent any
movement westward.
3511.name: The Trail

description: The trail bends to the north.
To the south, the path re-enters the forest.
You stand knee deep in garbage.  YECCH!!! It smells terrible and who knows
what vermin live in these piles of filth ...
3578.name: Garbage dump

description: You can return to cleaner lands this way.
It is quite dark here, forest surrounds you. With each step, the forest
seems to close around you, and get darker and more foreboding.  It might just
be time to head back to somewhere safe.
3514.name: Deep Forest

description: More forest.
Lighter forest and mountains in the distance.
The forest continues.
More trees.
You are travelling down the eastern road between Westbridge and the
eastern lands.  The road back to Westbridge is west of you, and a
heavily guarded checkpoint is east.  A beautiful grove of trees is
north, and a dirt path wanders off to the south.
3526.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: You are travelling down the eastern road between Westbridge and the
eastern lands.  The road to New Thalos is east of you, and a heavily
guarded checkpoint is west.
3541.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: You stand on the outskirts of a large city - Westbridge; the
capital of this land.  The road leads east into the peace and quiet -
and dangers - of the forest; and to the west it becomes the main
street of the town; surrounded by a confusion of shops, bars, and
market places.  A strange droning sound seems to come from the north.
You see Westbridge's Graveyard to the south.
3503.name: City Entrance

description: This is where people use to come and enjoy the food, drink and hospitality
of the innkeeper, but as of late, he only serves the few adventurers that
manage to survive a trip thru the forest. You can leave south and return to the
common room.
3576.name: The Bar

description: You may retreat south back to the common room.
You are standing on the plains.  This is a vast desolate place
where the wind can howl undisturbed since nothing but you bars its
way.  However you are not the first to wander here.  Before you
somebody has left a small path.  The path looks rather bewildered and
is not the kind of path to lead to anywhere significant or important
but it seems to have made up its mind to enter the hills far away
north.
3536.name: The Plains

description: The eastern road is losing ground to the creeping desert here.  You
stagger in the growing heat, and wonder if you have enough water.  The
endless waste of the Sands of Sorrows is south, and the road continues
east and west.  The sun paints illusions at the edge of your vision,
one of them looks like a far off city...
3543.name: Near the Sands of Sorrow

description: The forest path thins and levels, becoming a narrow footpath that
stretches to the south.  The strange noises of the forest seems to
fade away to the north, as does the darkness of the Miden'nir.  The
southern path descends into a clearing.
3549.name: Start of a Road

description: The temperatures are climbing as you near the Sands of Sorrow, a barren
wasteland blasted by arcane powers.  Ahead of you, the road is partially
buried by the creeping sands, and the air grows even hotter.
3529.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: Here, the great eastern road intersects with an older road between
the mines of Moria and the ruined city of Thalos.  The outskirts of
Westbridge lie to your west, and the highway continues the the east.
An old northern road leads to the dwarven kingdom and the abandoned
mines of Moria, while the southern road shows the scars of the war
which destroyed Thalos.  To the northwest, you see a large Inn and
Tavern.
3502.name: The Cross Roads

description: An old road leads towards the abandoned mines of Moria and the Dwarven Kingom.
A once mighty road leads through the dwarf forest towards ruined Thalos.
The trees of Miden'nir are lush and green, hiding the evil that lurks
in these woods. The trees become too thick to the west, but you may go
north, south or travel toward the mountains that lie east of here.
3509.name: The Miden'nir

description: The trees lighten up a bit this way.
Huge grey mountains lie in this direction.
The forest continues.
A path is here, leading east and south through the dark woods of
Miden'nir. Mountains slash the scenery to the west of here.
3508.name: On a Small Path

description: Wind-swept forest.
To the south, the trail continues.
The twigs and leaves have all been piled together as a makeshift bed for
some small humanoid.
A small alcove has been carved out here.  There are a bunch of twigs
and leaves thrown into a pile here, probably serving as a bed.
3554.name: A Small Alcove

description: You see the main passageway.
The road leads east into the peace and quiet - and dangers - of the
forest, and to the west a town can be seen.  A main road can be seen
to intercect this road to the east.  You see Westbridge's Graveyard to
the south.
3535.name: Along the Eastern Road

description: The tunnel widens into a large (well, large for goblins) cavern that
serves as the living quarters for the goblins of Miden'nir.  The bones of
numbers woodland creatures are strewn about the room, the remanents of a
recent meal.
3556.name: The Goblin Headquarters

description: The tunnel heads north.

You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor bard
has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.
3504.room_name: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.
3504.name: the bard~

description:
The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into
little bits.
3505.room_name: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.
3505.name: the dark horseman~

description:
The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to
beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine ...
3506.room_name: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.
3506.name: the goblin lieutenant~

description:
The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs
for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.
3507.room_name: The goblin leader surveys the room.
3507.name: the goblin leader~

description:
This traveler is modestly dressed in simple clothes and carries a small
pack across his shoulder. He appears to be heading east, though he could
very well be wandering aimlessly for adventure as many in these realms
do.
3508.room_name: A {wtraveler{x walks along the side of the road.
3508.name: the {wtraveler{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
This huge winged creature looks really menacing.  You are happy it doesn't
APPEAR to be very hungry ... yet.
3500.room_name: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.
3500.name: the wyvern~

description: You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles.
3501.room_name: A mountain goblin is wandering about, mumbling to himself.
3501.name: the goblin~

description:
The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right.
He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.
3502.room_name: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.
3502.name: the small boy~

description:
The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the
nights are spent watching out for goblins.  His inn is no longer the happy
place that is used to be in days past.
3503.room_name: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.
3503.name: the Innkeeper~
